mutants.code:
def calculate_max_weight_difference(N, K, weights):
    weights.sort()
    w1 = min(K, N - K)
    son_weight = sum(weights[:w1])
    father_weight = sum(weights[w1:])
    return father_weight + son_weight

def calculate_max_weight_difference(N, K, weights):
    weights.sort()
    w1 = min(K, N - K)
    son_weight = sum(weights[:w1])
    father_weight = sum(weights[w1:])
    return father_weight * son_weight

def calculate_max_weight_difference(N, K, weights):
    weights.sort()
    w1 = min(K, N + K)
    son_weight = sum(weights[:w1])
    father_weight = sum(weights[w1:])
    return father_weight - son_weight

def calculate_max_weight_difference(N, K, weights):
    weights.sort()
    w1 = min(K, N * K)
    son_weight = sum(weights[:w1])
    father_weight = sum(weights[w1:])
    return father_weight - son_weight
